casebody.data:
Dayton Bar Association v. Moore.

[Cite as Dayton Bar Assn. v. Moore (1982), 2 Ohio St. 3d 11.]

(D.D. No. 82-23 Decided November 24, 1982.) *12Mr. James Weprin, for relator. Per Curiam.

After a careful examination and review of the record in this cause, this court concurs with the findings and conclusions of the board that respondent violated DR 6-101(A)(l), DR 6-101(A)(3), and DR 7-101(A)(2).

It is the judgment of this court that respondent be indefinitely suspended from the practice of law.

Judgment accordingly.

Celebrezze, C.J., W. Brown, Sweeney, Locher, Holmes, C. Brown and Krupansky, JJ., concur.
